child.name: Three additional courses (two of which must be upper-division) chosen from those listed above in A, B, and C, and among a list of quarterly approved courses. With the approval of the Co-Directors of the Minor in Medical Humanities, other relevant courses may satisfy the requirements for the minor.
The list of quarterly approved courses is available on the Medical Humanities website: https://www.humanities.uci.edu/medicalhumanities
